function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in closed workplace environments","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread among employees","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, introduce air purifiers, and implement regular air circulation","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Employees in closed workplace environments","Owner":"Employers and workplace management"},{"Description":"Inability to maintain safe working distance in certain industries (e.g., meat processing)","Impact":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 due to close proximity of coworkers","Mitigation":"Implement policies for safe distancing, reconfigure workspaces, and provide protective barriers","Technologies":"Physical barriers, workspace reconfiguration","People":"Employees in industries with close working requirements","Owner":"Employers and industry regulators"},{"Description":"Intrinsic work patterns in the health sector leading to high vulnerability to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Provide personal protective equipment (PPE), implement stringent hygiene protocols, and prioritize vaccination","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment (PPE), hygiene protocols","People":"Healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions and authorities"}]}
